# [Interview #1115: Firefight Tour - El Cerrito, CA, Entry #53](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1115#53)

#### Question

My son wants to know...Why is Alcatraz a bad guy but he doesnâ€™t do bad things?

#### Brandon Sanderson

He ahm...You can just say to him that Alcatraz is not a bad guy but he has a poor opinion of himself. He has bad self esteem.
